data.actual_result: The member list anticipates a smaller font size and doesn't space things out right.
data.expected_result: The username and status should be shifted up farther, preventing the writing over the line visual bug.
data.short_description: Larger Font Size Members List Visual Bug
data.steps_to_repro: - Set the font size in your Android OS to large or largest - Check the members list of any guild or group - Anyone "playing" or "listening" will not have a line below their name and icon
